projects.title: Doctor Doc
projects.description: A cross-platform mobile app for managing medical appointments and remote consultations. Designed with Clean Architecture, integrated RESTful APIs and Firebase Auth, and set up GitHub Actions for CI/CD. UI built in Figma with accessible responsive layouts.

projects.title: PomoTasks
projects.description: A productivity app based on the Pomodoro method with real-time task tracking and session timing. Implemented cloud sync via Firebase and used Riverpod for state management. Focused on time-based UI/UX and structured testing with TDD.

projects.title: Fruits Store App
projects.description: An e-commerce app for fruit shopping with product browsing, cart, and checkout functionality. Integrated Firebase Realtime DB, Supabase, and payment APIs. Emphasized performance, reusable widgets, and responsive design.
